application.doc: Creating an HTTP Transformation Rule file

method.name: POST
method.id: Creating an HTTP Transformation Rule file
method.doc: To create an HTTP Transformation Rule file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the HTTP Transformation Rule file resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the new HTTP Transformation Rule file. This name must be unique.

param.name: template
param.doc: The template to create the file from. Valid values are "request" and "response".

param.name: content
param.doc: This is the content of the new HTTP Transformation Rule file as plain text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
